Html:
@Upgrade List: Rawr can filter by name and sort, but I am a paladin. I can use all types of armor. But I really don't want to equip cloth items on my toon, so I want to be able to choose what types of armor I will see in this list. I would do like a toolstripButton with a checkbox list with tho armor type names, so the user can choose the types he/she want to see in the list.

@Comparisons: Same thing. I don't want to see "Sunfire Robe" as a upgrade of my chestpiece. :-)



Best regards. =]~
This is already available. See Tools > Refine Types of Items Listed.
